name: Tokugawa Ieyasu
what_did:
Ieyasu brought peace to Japan after many years of fighting.
He became the first shogun of the Tokugawa family and ruled the country.
He made rules to keep the peace and helped Japan stay strong for over 250 years.
why_matters:
Tokugawa Ieyasu helped Japan become more peaceful and stable.
His leadership began a long time of calm and order, with better farming, learning, and culture.

questions.q: What country did Tokugawa Ieyasu lead?
What did Ieyasu bring to Japan?
How long did the Tokugawa family rule?
What was life like under Ieyasu?

fun_fact: He loved falcon hunting and wrote rules for how to treat animals!
